parameters.name: Dir
parameters.description: Plane , planar face , line , edge , cylinder , axis , or a pair of vertices that defines the direction

title: ISweepFeatureData.SetPathAlignmentDirectionVector
description: Sets the direction vector for path alignment in this sweep feature.

parameters.name: Dir
parameters.description: Plane , planar face , line , edge , cylinder , axis , or a pair of vertices that defines the direction

remarks:
This method is valid only if:
ISweepFeatureData:TwistControlType
is set to
swTwistControlType_e
.swTwistControlFollowPath.
- and -
ISweepFeatureData::PathAlignmentType
is set to
swTangencyType_e
.swTangencyDirectionVector.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
